tuv.seg: The Job Initiative Scheme is a programme providing full-time employment for people 35 years of age or over who have been unemployed for 5 years or more
Clár is ea an Scéim Tionscnamh Jabanna a chuireann fostaíocht lánaimsire ar fáil do dhaoine atá 35 bliana d'aois nó níos sine atá dífhostaithe le breis agus 5 bliana
Since November 2004, there has been no further recruitment onto the Scheme
Níor earcaíodh aon duine nua don scéim ó Shamhain 2004
Instead, you are invited to consider applying for available Community Employment vacancies
Ina áit sin, moltar duit cur isteach ar fholúntais atá ar fáil i bhFostaíocht Phobail
The following information therefore only applies to those currently employed under the Job Initiative Scheme
Ní bhaineann an fhaisnéis seo a leanas ach amháin leo siúd atá fostaithe faoi láthair faoin Scéim Tionscnamh Jabanna
In order to qualify, you must have been in receipt of an appropriate social welfare payment over that 5-year period
Ní foláir nó go raibh tú ag fáil na híocaíochta iomchuí leasa shóisialaigh i rith na tréimhse 5 bliana sin chun go mbeidh tú incháilithe
The aim of the Job Initiative programme is to assist long-term unemployed persons to prepare for work opportunities in the open labour market
Is éard is aidhm leis an gClár Tionscnamh Jabanna ná cabhrú le daoine atá dífhostaithe ar feadh tréimhse fhada iad féin a ullmhú do dheiseanna fostaíochta ar an margadh oscailte oibre
The programme does this by providing participants with work experience, training and development opportunities
Déanann an clár é seo trí thaithí oibre, traenáil agus deiseanna forbartha a chur ar fáil do na rannpháirtithe
The same employment conditions apply to the Scheme as in other jobs
Baineann na coinníollacha céanna leis an scéim is a bhaineann le jabanna eile
For example, you have the same employment rights and protections regarding annual leave, sick leave, maternity leave, grievance or disciplinary procedures and your income is taxable

Beidh na cearta agus an chosaint fostaíochta chéanna agat maidir le saoire bhliantúil mar shampla, saoire bhreoiteachta, saoire mháithreachais, nósanna imeachta faoi chasaoid nó disciplín agus beidh ioncam inchánaithe agat
As recruitment to the Job Initiative Scheme finished in November 2004, the following information applies only to those currently employed under the Scheme
Ós rud é gur cuireadh deireadh le hearcaíocht don Scéim Tionscnamh Jabanna i Samhain, 2004 ní bhaineann an fhaisnéis seo ach leo siúd atá fostaithe faoin Scéim faoi láthair
In order to participate in the Job Initiative Scheme you must have been over 35 years of age and have been receiving one of the following payments for 5 years or more
Ní mór duit a bheith os cionn 35 bliana d'aois agus ceann de na híocaíochtaí seo a leanas a bheith á fháil agat le 5 bliana nó níos mó le bheith páirteach sa Scéim Tionscnamh Jabanna
You may qualify for Family Income Supplement if you have children
D'fhéadfá a bheith cáilithe le haghaidh Forlíonadh Ioncam Teaghlaigh má tá leanaí agat
Limited funding is available for training
Tá maoiniú teoranta ar fáil le haghaidh traenáil
You will keep your medical card for the duration of the scheme
Coinneoidh tú do chárta leighis ar feadh fad na scéime
You will keep your extra benefits provided you continue to satisfy the conditions for these benefits
Coimeádfaidh tú teidlíocht ar shochair breise ar chuntar go sásaítear na coinníollacha le haghaidh na liúntais seo
You are paid the going rate for the job
Íoctar an ráta reatha don jab sin leat
The minimum payment to a Job Initiative participant is €416
Tá an íosíocaócht do rannpháirtí sa Scéim Tionscnamh Jabanna €416
For further information contact your local employment services office or Intreo centre
Téigh i dteagmháil le d'oifig seirbhísí fostaíochta áitiúil nó ionad Intreo le breis eolais a fháil
